bs-distribution-tag-categorytree-desc: Provides a dynamic view of the wiki's category structure as a tree.
bs-distribution-tag-ref-desc: Marks the text enclosed by the ref tags as a footnote.
bs-distribution-tag-references-desc: Inserts the text of all the citations which have defined in 'ref' tags up to that point in the page
bs-distribution-tag-quiz-desc: Enables you to add 'quiz' like questions to a page.
bs-distribution-tag-embedvideo-desc: Enables you to embed video clips from popular video sharing services.
bs-distribution-tag-dynamicpagelist-desc: Outputs a dynamic list of pages based on a set of different parameters.
